articles.description: Manchester United have spent £200m on new forwards, but their only Premier League goal so far was scored by a Fulham player.
articles.title: Teething problems for Man Utd's £200m frontline

articles.description: England's Tommy Fleetwood wins the Tour Championship by three shots to claim his first PGA Tour victory.
articles.title: Tommy Fleetwood wins Tour Championship: First PGA Tour victory at 164th attempt for English Ryder Cup star

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Real Oviedo vs Real Madrid in the Spanish La Liga
articles.title: Real Oviedo vs Real Madrid: Spanish La Liga stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Emma Raducanu ruthlessly sweeps aside Japanese qualifier Ena Shibahara to earn her first win at the US Open since her 2021 title triumph.
articles.title: US Open 2025 results: Emma Raducanu beats Ena Shibahara to earn first New York win since 2021 title triumph

articles.description: Novak Djokovic hopes the "physical struggle" he faced before powering to victory in the US Open first round is simply down to a lack of match practice.
articles.title: US Open 2025 results: Novak Djokovic scraps through after Ben Shelton and Taylor Fritz win on day one

articles.description: Wayne Rooney says Max Dowman has got the whole football world talking as he offers the Arsenal teenager advice following his Premier League debut.
articles.title: Wayne Rooney: Arsenal's Max Dowman is the name on everybody's lips

articles.description: The FA is investigating a banner unfurled by Crystal Palace fans that depicted Nottingham Forest owner Evangelos Marinakis holding a gun to midfielder Morgan Gibbs-White's head.
articles.title: FA to investigate Crystal Palace fans' Evangelos Marinakis, Morgan Gibbs-White banner

articles.description: United States president Donald Trump says he will attend the 2025 Ryder Cup next month -  and wants Keegan Bradley to be the USA's first playing captain since 1963.
articles.title: Ryder Cup 2025: US President Donald Trump will attend and backs captain Keegan Bradley to play

articles.description: Jonathan David scores on his debut as Juventus beat Parma in their Serie A opener.
articles.title: Juventus 2-0 Parma: Jonathan David scores on Serie A debut

articles.description: Jack Grealish provides the inspiration and smiles as Everton make the perfect start at their magnificent new stadium, says chief football writer Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Jack Grealish: England hopeful inspires Everton to winning start at new stadium
